about_the_game:
Unleash the power of myth and history in "Kingdoms of Myth", a turn-based strategy game set to release on September, 2023. Command a diverse array of historical factions and harness the power of mythological elements to defeat your enemies. Progress from classic antiquity to the Renaissance as you build and lead an army of unique units from all over the world. Take command of powerful heroes with their own unique skills and lead your faction to victory.

Explore a massive variety of civilizations, with 100 different factions to choose from, each with their own unique army, technologies, and skills. The game mechanics are easy to learn but offer enormous diversity, with over 800 different units illustrated by almost 500 different artists. Will you rise to the challenge and conquer your enemies? Get ready to play "Kingdoms of Myth" on Steam on September, 2023.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows: 7 SP1+, 8, 10

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
